message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for both of us considering the inflation.
I think it's fair that we split the money more evenly, considering the inflation will benefit me more. This offer gives us both a good amount, and it avoids any further haggling.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is my last chance to get a decent share before the inflation hits again.  My offer is fair and avoids further complications.
